abstract: Editorial celebrates release of Israeli soldier Gilad Shalit, who was held by Hamas for five years; asserts that if Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu can negotiate with Hamas for the release of a prisoner, why not with the Palestinian Authority for a viable peace accord?
snippet: If Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel can negotiate with Hamas for the release of a prisoner, why not with the Palestinian Authority?
lead_paragraph: If Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel can negotiate with Hamas for the release of a prisoner, why not with the Palestinian Authority?
